title: 820-00840-A  Not Turning On
message:
I have a 820-00840-A board not powering up, F4800 got got 12v on both sides, PP5V_S4 = 0V , whats next?

PPBUS_G3H = 12v on battery but 0v when using USB C adaptor (ggod adaptor)

No history of liquid damage

title: 820-00840-A  Not Turning On
message:
Any history available?
You must work on the board without battery, untill get correct PPBUS_G3H with charger only.

Probably one CD3215 chip is bad.
Must check some voltages and diode mode readings on the their power pins...

title: 820-00840-A  Not Turning On
message: Never measure with the battery attached it will not help you. Do you have 5 volts or 20 volts on DC-in with just the charger?

title: 820-00840-A  Not Turning On
message:

title: 820-00840-A  Not Turning On
message: My apologies, actually i don't know where to start, these USB power issues are pain in the butt, ok ill check power pins of u3200 and u3100

title: 820-00840-A  Not Turning On
message:
U3200

Pin 2 PP1V8_UPC_XB_LDOD = 1.8v
Pin 10 PPDCIN_G3H = 5v
Pin 11 PP5V_S4 = 0v
Pin 12 PP3V3_UPC_XB_LDO = 3.3v
Pin 35 PP1V1_UPC_XB_LDO_BMC = 0v
Pin 70 PP20V_USBC_XB_VBUS = 5v
Pin 75 PP1V8_UPC_XB_LDOA = 0v

U3100

Pin 2 PP1V8_UPC_XB_LDOD = 0v (still 0v even when i change the charger usb port)
Pin 10 PPDCIN_G3H = 5v
Pin 11 PP5V_S4 = 0v
Pin 12 PP3V3_UPC_XB_LDO = 2.3v
Pin 35 PP1V1_UPC_XB_LDO_BMC = 0v
Pin 70 PP20V_USBC_XB_VBUS = 0v (got 5v when i change the charger usb port)
Pin 75 PP1V8_UPC_XB_LDOA = 0v

title: 820-00840-A  Not Turning On
message: PPDCIN is 5 volts so forget any voltage from PPBUS on for the moment. DCIN must be 20 volts. Post voltage for PP3v3_G3H

title: 820-00840-A  Not Turning On
message:
"U3100
-------------------------
Pin 2 PP1V8_UPC_XB_LDOD = 0v (still 0v even when i change the charger usb port)
---------------
Pin 12 PP3V3_UPC_XB_LDO = 2.3v"
You just found the culprit.
Comparing diode mode readings between chips can help too.

title: 820-00840-A  Not Turning On
message: Changed u3100 now boots, damn you guys are good!
